# langsmith_playground_settings (Resource)

Manages LangSmith playground settings.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "langsmith_playground_settings" "example" {
  name     = "default-settings"
  settings = jsonencode({ temperature = 0.7, max_tokens = 1000 })
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `settings` (String) A JSON string containing the settings object.

### Optional

- `description` (String) A description of the playground settings.
- `name` (String) The name of the playground settings.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the playground settings.
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp.
